Package org.apache.beam.sdk.testing

Defines utilities for unit testing Dataflow pipelines.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NeedsRunner
    Category tag for validation tests which utilize TestPipeline for execution and expect to be executed by a PipelineRunner.
    RunnableOnService
    Category tag for validation tests which utilize TestPipeline for execution and PAssert for validation.
    SerializableMatcher<T>
    A Matcher that is also Serializable.
    TestPipelineOptions
    TestPipelineOptions is a set of options for test pipelines.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CoderProperties
    Properties for use in Coder tests.
    CrashingRunner
    A PipelineRunner that applies no overrides and throws an exception on calls to Pipeline.run().
    PAssert
    An assertion on the contents of a PCollection incorporated into the pipeline.
    PAssert.IterableAssert<T>
    An assertion about the contents of a PCollectionView yielding an Iterable<T>.
    PAssert.OneSideInputAssert<ActualT>
    An assertion checker that takes a single PCollectionView<ActualT> and an assertion over ActualT, and checks it within a dataflow pipeline.
    PAssert.SingletonAssert<T>
    An assertion about the single value of type T associated with a PCollectionView.
    PAssert.TwoSideInputAssert<ActualT,ExpectedT>
    An assertion checker that takes a PCollectionView<ActualT>, a PCollectionView<ExpectedT>, a relation over A and B, and checks that the relation holds within a dataflow pipeline.
    SourceTestUtils
    Helper functions and test harnesses for checking correctness of Source implementations.
    TestPipeline
    A creator of test pipelines that can be used inside of tests that can be configured to run locally or against a remote pipeline runner.
    TestPipelineOptions.AlwaysPassMatcher
    Matcher which will always pass.
    TestPipelineOptions.AlwaysPassMatcherFactory
    Factory for PipelineResult matchers which always pass.
    WindowFnTestUtils
    A utility class for testing WindowFns.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SourceTestUtils.ExpectedSplitOutcome
    Expected outcome of BoundedSource.BoundedReader.splitAtFraction(double).

Package org.apache.beam.sdk.testing Description

Defines utilities for unit testing Dataflow pipelines. The tests for the PTransforms and examples included the Dataflow SDK provide examples of using these utilities.
